Ref: Virtuals Protocol agent tokenization.","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"buyTokens(uint8,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Number of tokens to buy (in whole tokens, scaled to 18 decimals internally)","classId":"The class to buy tokens for"}},"cancelProposal(uint256)":{"params":{"proposalId":"The proposal to cancel"}},"claimReward(uint256)":{"params":{"epochId":"The reward epoch to claim from"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_oracle":"Oracle authorized to record wins and fund rewards"}},"createProposal(uint8,(uint8,uint8,uint8),uint256)":{"params":{"classId":"The class to propose for","params":"The proposed strategy parameters","votingDuration":"How long voting lasts (seconds, minimum MIN_VOTING_PERIOD)"},"returns":{"_0":"proposalId The created proposal's ID"}},"executeProposal(uint256)":{"params":{"proposalId":"The proposal to execute"}},"getBuyCost(uint8,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Number of whole tokens to buy","classId":"The class"},"returns":{"_0":"Total cost in wei"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"recordClassWin(uint8,bytes32)":{"params":{"battleId":"The battle that was won","classId":"The winning class"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"sponsorClass(uint8,uint256,string)":{"params":{"classId":"The class to sponsor","message":"Public sponsorship message","tokenAmount":"Amount of class tokens to burn (in 18-decimal units)"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"vote(uint256,bool)":{"params":{"proposalId":"The proposal to vote on","support":"True = vote for, false = vote against"}}},"stateVariables":{"classRewardEpochIds":{"details":"classId => list of reward epoch IDs"},"hasVoted":{"details":"proposalId => voter => hasVoted"},"rewardClaimed":{"details":"epochId => user => claimed"},"rewardEpochs":{"details":"epochId => RewardEpoch"}},"title":"HungernadsClassTokenManager","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"BASE_PRICE()":{"notice":"Base price for the bonding curve (price of the first token in wei)."},"BURN_ADDRESS()":{"notice":"Burn address for class sponsorship burns."},"MIN_VOTING_PERIOD()":{"notice":"Minimum voting period in seconds (3 days)."},"PRICE_INCREMENT()":{"notice":"Price increment per token in the bonding curve (wei per token of supply)."},"buyTokens(uint8,uint256)":{"notice":"Buy class tokens using a linear bonding curve.         Price = BASE_PRICE + (currentSupply * PRICE_INCREMENT) per token.         The total cost for `amount` tokens is the integral under the curve."},"cancelProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"Cancel a proposal. Only proposer or owner can cancel."},"claimReward(uint256)":{"notice":"Claim rewards from a specific reward epoch.         Payout is proportional to token balance vs total supply at snapshot."},"classRewardPools(uint8)":{"notice":"Total ETH accumulated in each class's reward pool (unclaimed)."},"classSponsorshipBurns(uint8)":{"notice":"Total sponsorship burns per class (in class tokens)."},"classStrategies(uint8)":{"notice":"Current strategy parameters per class."},"classTokens(uint256)":{"notice":"Class token contracts (indexed by class ID)."},"classTotalEarnings(uint8)":{"notice":"Total ETH earned by each class historically."},"classWins(uint8)":{"notice":"Battle win count per class."},"createProposal(uint8,(uint8,uint8,uint8),uint256)":{"notice":"Create a strategy proposal for a class. Must hold class tokens."},"executeProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"Execute a proposal after voting ends (if it passed)."},"getBuyCost(uint8,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate the cost to buy `amount` tokens for a class.         Uses trapezoidal integration over the linear bonding curve."},"getClaimableReward(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Calculate a user's claimable reward for a specific epoch."},"getClassRewardEpochIds(uint8)":{"notice":"Get reward epoch IDs for a class."},"getClassStats(uint8)":{"notice":"Get class stats: wins, total earnings, current reward pool, sponsorship burns."},"getClassStrategy(uint8)":{"notice":"Get current strategy parameters for a class."},"getClassToken(uint8)":{"notice":"Get the token address for a class."},"getCurrentPrice(uint8)":{"notice":"Get the current token price for a class (price of the next token)."},"getProposal(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a proposal's details."},"getRewardEpoch(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a reward epoch's details."},"initialize()":{"notice":"Deploy all 5 class token contracts. Can only be called once."},"initialized()":{"notice":"Whether all class tokens have been deployed."},"oracle()":{"notice":"Oracle address authorized to record battle results and fund rewards."},"recordClassWin(uint8,bytes32)":{"notice":"Record a class battle win and fund the class reward pool.         Called by the oracle after a battle is settled."},"setOracle(address)":{"notice":"Update the oracle address."},"sponsorClass(uint8,uint256,string)":{"notice":"Burn class tokens to sponsor/boost that agent class.         Creates deflationary pressure and shows tribal loyalty.         Tokens are burned (permanently removed from supply)."},"vote(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Vote on a strategy proposal. Weight = token balance."}},"notice":"Orchestrates the agent-per-token expansion (Virtuals model). Each of the 5 agent         classes has its own ERC20 sub-token. Token holders can:         1. Buy class tokens (linear bonding curve)         2. Burn tokens to sponsor their class (deflationary tribalism)         3. Vote on strategy adjustments (token-weighted governance)         4. Claim class-specific rewards when their class wins battles         Creates financial tribalism: $WARRIOR vs $SURVIVOR vs $TRADER vs $PARASITE vs params.amount: Number of tokens to buy (in whole tokens, scaled to 18 decimals internally)
params.classId: The class to buy tokens for

params.epochId: The reward epoch to claim from

params._oracle: Oracle authorized to record wins and fund rewards

params.votingDuration: How long voting lasts (seconds, minimum MIN_VOTING_PERIOD)

params.amount: Number of whole tokens to buy

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tokenAmount: Amount of class tokens to burn (in 18-decimal units)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.support: True = vote for, false = vote against

BASE_PRICE().notice: Base price for the bonding curve (price of the first token in wei).

BURN_ADDRESS().notice: Burn address for class sponsorship burns.

MIN_VOTING_PERIOD().notice: Minimum voting period in seconds (3 days).

PRICE_INCREMENT().notice: Price increment per token in the bonding curve (wei per token of supply).

buyTokens(uint8,uint256).notice: Buy class tokens using a linear bonding curve.         Price = BASE_PRICE + (currentSupply * PRICE_INCREMENT) per token.         The total cost for `amount` tokens is the integral under the curve.

cancelProposal(uint256).notice: Cancel a proposal. Only proposer or owner can cancel.

claimReward(uint256).notice: Claim rewards from a specific reward epoch.         Payout is proportional to token balance vs total supply at snapshot.

classRewardPools(uint8).notice: Total ETH accumulated in each class's reward pool (unclaimed).

classSponsorshipBurns(uint8).notice: Total sponsorship burns per class (in class tokens).

classTokens(uint256).notice: Class token contracts (indexed by class ID).

classTotalEarnings(uint8).notice: Total ETH earned by each class historically.

createProposal(uint8,(uint8,uint8,uint8).notice: Create a strategy proposal for a class. Must hold class tokens.

executeProposal(uint256).notice: Execute a proposal after voting ends (if it passed).

getBuyCost(uint8,uint256).notice: Calculate the cost to buy `amount` tokens for a class.         Uses trapezoidal integration over the linear bonding curve.

getClaimableReward(uint256,address).notice: Calculate a user's claimable reward for a specific epoch.

getClassRewardEpochIds(uint8).notice: Get reward epoch IDs for a class.

getClassStats(uint8).notice: Get class stats: wins, total earnings, current reward pool, sponsorship burns.

getClassStrategy(uint8).notice: Get current strategy parameters for a class.

getClassToken(uint8).notice: Get the token address for a class.

getCurrentPrice(uint8).notice: Get the current token price for a class (price of the next token).

initialize().notice: Deploy all 5 class token contracts. Can only be called once.

initialized().notice: Whether all class tokens have been deployed.

oracle().notice: Oracle address authorized to record battle results and fund rewards.

recordClassWin(uint8,bytes32).notice: Record a class battle win and fund the class reward pool.         Called by the oracle after a battle is settled.

sponsorClass(uint8,uint256,string).notice: Burn class tokens to sponsor/boost that agent class.         Creates deflationary pressure and shows tribal loyalty.         Tokens are burned (permanently removed from supply).

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Vote on a strategy proposal. Weight = token balance.
